pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reversible-Jump MCMC Using Post-Processing // Performs reversible-jump Markov chain Monte Carlo (Green, 1995) doi:10.2307/2337340, specifically the restriction introduced by Barker Link (2013) doi:10.1080/00031305.2013.791644. By utilising a 'universal parameter' space, RJMCMC is treated as a Gibbs sampling problem. Previously-calculated posterior distributions are used to quickly estimate posterior model probabilities. Jacobian matrices are found using automatic differentiation.
